name: oval-charm
short_effect: Doubles the chance of two Pokémon producing an egg at the daycare every 255 steps.

flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
An oval charm said to increase the
chance of Eggs being found
at the Day Care.

being found at the Day Care.
